feed.title: Combined summary - Some interviews from Amsterdam 2014

entry.title: Combined summary - Some interviews from Amsterdam 2014
entry.summary: Back in 2014, Michael conducted a series of interviews with notable figures at the Bitcoin Conference in Amsterdam. Among his interviewees were Gavin Andresen, Peter Surda, Patrick Byrne, and Stefan Thomas. After years of waiting, these interviews have finally been released on Michael's YouTube channel, WYONAPICTURES. Interested viewers can access the videos through the provided link.
